text: The Yellow Balloon is a 1953 British drama movie directed by J. Lee Thompson and starring Kathleen Ryan, Andrew Ray, Kenneth More, Bernard Lee, Sid James, Marjorie Rhodes, William Sylvester, Veronica Hurst. It was distributed by Associated British Picture Corporation. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by J. Lee Thompson
title: The Yellow Balloon (movie)
